#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

string a;

int main() {
 cin>>a;
 int len=a.size();
 for (int i=0;i<len;i++) {
    if (a[i]=='w') cout<<'q';
    if (a[i]=='e') cout<<'w';
    if (a[i]=='r') cout<<'e';
    if (a[i]=='t') cout<<'r';
    if (a[i]=='y') cout<<'t';
    if (a[i]=='u') cout<<'y';
    if (a[i]=='i') cout<<'u';
    if (a[i]=='o') cout<<'i';
    if (a[i]=='p') cout<<'o';
    if (a[i]=='s') cout<<'a';
    if (a[i]=='d') cout<<'s';
    if (a[i]=='f') cout<<'d';
    if (a[i]=='g') cout<<'f';
    if (a[i]=='h') cout<<'g';
    if (a[i]=='j') cout<<'h';
    if (a[i]=='k') cout<<'j';
    if (a[i]=='l') cout<<'k';
    if (a[i]=='x') cout<<'z';
    if (a[i]=='c') cout<<'x';
    if (a[i]=='v') cout<<'c';
    if (a[i]=='b') cout<<'v';
    if (a[i]=='n') cout<<'b';
    if (a[i]=='m') cout<<'n';

    if (a[i]=='W') cout<<'Q';
    if (a[i]=='E') cout<<'W';
    if (a[i]=='R') cout<<'E';
    if (a[i]=='T') cout<<'R';
    if (a[i]=='Y') cout<<'T';
    if (a[i]=='U') cout<<'Y';
    if (a[i]=='I') cout<<'U';
    if (a[i]=='O') cout<<'I';
    if (a[i]=='P') cout<<'P';
    if (a[i]=='S') cout<<'A';
    if (a[i]=='D') cout<<'S';
    if (a[i]=='F') cout<<'D';
    if (a[i]=='G') cout<<'F';
    if (a[i]=='H') cout<<'G';
    if (a[i]=='J') cout<<'H';
    if (a[i]=='K') cout<<'J';
    if (a[i]=='L') cout<<'K';
    if (a[i]=='X') cout<<'Z';
    if (a[i]=='C') cout<<'X';
    if (a[i]=='V') cout<<'C';
    if (a[i]=='B') cout<<'V';
    if (a[i]=='N') cout<<'B';
    if (a[i]=='M') cout<<'N';
 }
}
